        public static org.w3c.dom.Element getChildElementByName(org.w3c.dom.Node parent,
                                                        java.lang.String tagName)
        Returns the first occurrence of a child element with the specified tag name. Note: only immediate children are candidates (not all descendents).
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent node
        tagName - The child tag name
        Returns:
        The child Element or null if none found

      • getXML

        public static java.lang.String getXML(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                               throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException,
                                      javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Convert a Document (DOM) into an XML String.
        Parameters:
        doc - The Document
        Returns:
        The XML String
        Throws:
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException - If there is a configuration issue
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - If unable to transform the Document
